short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notify when actors, actresses and artists are on Cameo.com while watching Netflix or listening to Spotify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aleerty is a notification tool that provides alerts from available actors and artists on Cameo.com while using Netflix.com and Spotify.com
By installing Aleerty, it provides a quick way to discover actors and artists and refers you to their account profile on Cameo.com
